pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Interface to 'FishBase' // A programmatic interface to http://www.fishbase.org, re-written based on an accompanying 'RESTful' API. Access tables describing over 30,000 species of fish, their biology, ecology, morphology, and more. This package also supports experimental access to http://www.sealifebase.org data, which contains nearly 200,000 species records for all types of aquatic life not covered by 'FishBase.'
